name: Fight For America: Defense War
description:
Fight for America is a tactical and strategy tower defense game where you must battle your way across the country in a quest for conquest, liberating state after state from its enemies and showing your patriotism at its fullest potential.

With a focus on both tactical strategy and base defense, you must defend your own base while also attacking enemy bases in a race to conquer the city, conquer the tower and end this war. The game features a variety of different countryballs as enemies, each with their own unique strengths and weaknesses.

You must use any kind of turret and other warfare tactics to defeat these enemies, protect the country and ultimately triumph in the fight for America's conquest.

With challenging gameplay and a compelling patriotism storyline, Fight for America is a must-have for any fan of tower defense and strategy games that want to conquer the tower and the state. So, don't let them conquer the city, set up your base defense, tactical and strategy solutions, use the turret and many other warfare tactics, win this battle and end this war!

Make America Free Again by re-conquering every state with your war tactics and battle strategy!
